articles.description: Tech News Today (December 1, 2023): Here's a mix of tech news tidbits to digest on this Friday. Nothing Phone gets a big permanent price cut, Google shares its fave apps, WhatsApp boosts chat privacy, and Elon Musk tells advertisers where to go.
